languages.text:
"Данная единица осуществляла функции старшего планетарного разведчика на протяжении — данные засекречены — процедурных циклов. Она была отмечена:
1) тремя повышениями в статусе на одну ступень,
2) правом на священную {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}аугментацию{/g} второй категории,
3) пометкой в общефлотском архиве "ценная единица".

"This unit functioned as a senior planetary scout for the duration of — data classified — procedural cycles. It was distinguished with:
1) three promotions by one grade,
2) the right to a tier 2 sacred {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}augmentation{/g},
3) a notation in the fleet-wide archive as a 'valuable unit.'"
languages.original_text:
"Данная единица осуществляла функции старшего планетарного разведчика на протяжении — данные засекречены — процедурных циклов. Она была отмечена:
1) тремя повышениями в статусе на одну ступень,
2) правом на священную {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}аугментацию{/g} второй категории,
3) пометкой в общефлотском архиве "ценная единица".

traits.locale_text: "This unit had functioned as a senior planetary scout for the duration of — data classified — procedural cycles. It was distinguished with: a) three one-step status promotions, b) a right to a tier 2 sacred augmentation, c) a notation in the fleet-wide archive that states, 'valuable unit'."

"This unit had functioned as a senior planetary scout for the duration of — data classified — procedural cycles. It was distinguished with: a) three one-step status promotions, b) a right to a tier 2 sacred augmentation, c) a notation in the fleet-wide archive that states, 'valuable unit'."

"This unit functioned as a senior planetary scout for the duration of — data classified — procedural cycles. It was distinguished with: a) three promotions by one grade, b) the right to a tier 2 sacred augmentation, c) a notation in the fleet-wide archive as a 'valuable unit.'"

1) three promotions by one grade,
2) the right to a tier 2 sacred {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}augmentation{/g},
3) a notation in the fleet-wide archive as a 'valuable unit.'"

languages.text:
「本ユニットは…『機密情報』…プロシージャル周回後、上級惑星偵察兵として機能しました。本ユニットは以下のような特徴を有しています。
1）1等級ごとに3段階分の昇進
2）クラス2の神聖{g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}増強装置{/g}の所有権利
3）艦隊全体のアーカイブに『貴重なユニット』として記録される
languages.original_text:
"This unit functioned as a senior planetary scout for the duration of — data classified — procedural cycles. It was distinguished with:
1) three promotions by one grade,
2) the right to a tier 2 sacred {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}augmentation{/g},
3) a notation in the fleet-wide archive as a 'valuable unit.'"

traits.locale_text:
「本ユニットは…『機密情報』…プロシージャル周回後、上級惑星偵察兵として機能しました。本ユニットは以下のような特徴を有しています。
1）1等級ごとに3段階分の昇進
2）クラス2の神聖{g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}増強装置{/g}の所有権利
3）艦隊全体のアーカイブに『貴重なユニット』として記録される

languages.text:
“本单位在‘数据保密’程序周期内担任高级行星侦察员，其特点为：
1）在同一阶段晋升三次；
2）有权获得第二阶级神圣{g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}植入物{/g}；
3）在整个舰队的档案中标记为‘有价值的单位’。”
languages.original_text:
"This unit functioned as a senior planetary scout for the duration of — data classified — procedural cycles. It was distinguished with:
1) three promotions by one grade,
2) the right to a tier 2 sacred {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}augmentation{/g},
3) a notation in the fleet-wide archive as a 'valuable unit.'"

languages.text:
"Diese Einheit war – Daten geheim – Prozesszyklen lang als leitender Planetenspäher tätig. Sie wurde ausgezeichnet mit:
1) drei Beförderungen um jeweils einen Grad,
2) dem Recht auf eine heilige {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}Augmentation{/g} der 2. Stufe;
3) einem Vermerk im flottenweiten Archiv als 'wertvolle Einheit'."
languages.original_text:
"This unit functioned as a senior planetary scout for the duration of — data classified — procedural cycles. It was distinguished with:
1) three promotions by one grade,
2) the right to a tier 2 sacred {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}augmentation{/g},
3) a notation in the fleet-wide archive as a 'valuable unit.'"

traits.locale_text:
"Diese Einheit war – Daten geheim – Prozesszyklen lang als leitender Planetenspäher tätig. Sie wurde ausgezeichnet mit:
1) drei Beförderungen um jeweils einen Grad,
2) dem Recht auf eine heilige {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}Augmentation{/g} der 2. Stufe;
3) einem Vermerk im flottenweiten Archiv als 'wertvolle Einheit'."

languages.text:
"Bu birim, kıdemli gezegen keşif eri olarak — gizli veri — yöntemsel döngü boyunca işlev görmektedir. Şu özellikleriyle diğerlerinden sıyrılmıştır:
1) Bir statüde üç terfiye ulaşmış,
2) 2. kademe kutsal {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}ogmentasyon{/g} hakkı kazanmış,
3) Filo geneli arşive 'değerli birim' olarak kaydedilmiştir."
languages.original_text:
"This unit functioned as a senior planetary scout for the duration of — data classified — procedural cycles. It was distinguished with:
1) three promotions by one grade,
2) the right to a tier 2 sacred {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}augmentation{/g},
3) a notation in the fleet-wide archive as a 'valuable unit.'"

traits.locale_text:
"Bu birim, kıdemli gezegensel izci olarak — gizli veri — yöntemsel döngü boyunca görev aldı. Şu özellikleriyle diğerlerinden sıyrıldı:
1) Bir kademede üç terfi kazandı,
2) 2. kademe kutsal {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}ogmentasyon{/g} hakkı kazandı,
3) Filo geneli arşive 'değerli birim' olarak kaydedildi."
